name: EditWarehouseSavedQuery
description:
Update a specific warehouse saved query.

Use this tool to update a saved query in a warehouse. It is applicable when changes need to be made to existing warehouse queries.

parameters.name: saved_query_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the specific data warehouse saved query to update.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this data warehouse saved query.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the project to access. Retrieve this ID via /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: warehouse_query_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the details to update the warehouse saved query, including ID, status, and query specifics.

status.description:
The status of when this SavedQuery last ran.

* `Cancelled` - Cancelled
* `Modified` - Modified
* `Completed` - Completed
* `Failed` - Failed
* `Running` - Running

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this data warehouse saved query.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this data warehouse saved query.

parameters.name: project_id

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
